title: Bronze 5 Support looking for players to climb with!
body:
Bronze support that's sick of solo queue getting me no where, I'm at a point where i get to promos and lose, get to promos and lose so on and so forth so I'm looking for one or two people willing to help me climb out of ELO hell. I don't care if you're not "Faker" or "DoubleLift" so long as you have a positive attitude don't flame and above all don't feed your ass off. It may also help if you have Curse or Skype to communicate.

Add ThreshXG if you're keen

(Champs I play {{champion:432}} {{champion:53}} {{champion:201}} {{champion:43}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:25}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:412}}{{champion:16}}  )

replies.body: i can partner up with you
are you still in need of partners? if so add me on lol then msg me when you can see me online
You still looking for a duo partner?- Skype available
